######################################################################
#
#Â Â ___________Â  Â Â  Â _________ .__Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â __
#Â Â \__Â  Â  __________\_Â  Â ___ \|Â Â |__ _____ _/Â Â |_
#Â Â |Â  Â  |Â Â \_Â Â __ /Â  Â  \Â Â \/|Â Â |Â Â \\__Â Â \\Â  Â __\
#Â Â |Â  Â  |Â  Â |Â Â | \\Â  Â Â Â \___|Â  Â YÂ Â \/ __ \|Â Â |
#Â Â |____|Â  Â |__|Â  Â \______Â Â |___|Â Â (____Â Â |__|
#Â Â \/Â  Â Â Â \/Â  Â Â Â \/Â Â TrChat Formats
#
# Advanced Json format chat
#
# FORMAT-EXAMPLE:
#Â  Â example-part: # id
#Â  Â Â Â text: 'ABC' # display text
#Â  Â Â Â hover: '%player_name%' # hover display
#Â  Â Â Â command: '/tpa %player_name%' # click execute command
#
######################################################################

NORMAL:
Â Â # Requirement to use this format, for example: 'player.isOp()'
Â Â - requirement: null

Â  Â  # Message part
Â  Â  msg:
Â  Â Â  Â # Default chat color
Â  Â Â  Â # (when the player doesn't have any permission of trchat.color.force-defaultcolor.<CODE>)
Â  Â Â  Â default-color: '7'
Â  Â Â  Â hover: '&7Date: %server_time_h:mm:ss a%'

Â  Â  # Custom Json Format Parts (Before Message Part)
Â  Â  parts:
Â  Â Â  Â world:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â text: '&8[&3%player_world%&8]'
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â hover: |-
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &r
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &8â–ª &7Location: &3%player_world%&7, &2%player_x%/%player_y%/%player_z%
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &r
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &6â–¶ &eClick here to send a teleport request
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &r
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â command: '/tpa %player_name%'
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â # (Optional) Requirement to display this JSON part for the player
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â requirement: null
Â  Â Â  Â part-before-player:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â text: ' '
Â  Â Â  Â player:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â text: '&7%player_name%'
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â hover: |-
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &r
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &8â–ª &7Ping: &3%player_ping% Ms
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &8â–ª &7Health: &c%player_health_rounded% â¤
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &r
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &6â–¶ &eClick to chat with me
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &r
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â suggest: '/msg %player_name% '
Â  Â Â  Â part-before-msg:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â text: '&7: '

######################################################################
#
# PRIVATE FORMAT (SENDER)
#
######################################################################
PRIVATE_SEND:
Â Â - requirement: null
Â  Â  parts:
Â  Â Â  Â sender:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â text: '&8[&a%player_name% &7â¦ %toplayer_name%&3&8] '
Â  Â  msg:
Â  Â Â  Â default-color: 'f'
Â  Â Â  Â hover: '&7Date: %server_time_h:mm:ss a%'

######################################################################
#
# PRIVATE FORMAT (RECEIVER)
#
######################################################################
PRIVATE_RECEIVE:
Â Â - requirement: null
Â  Â  parts:
Â  Â Â  Â receive:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â text: '&8[&6%player_name% &7â¥ &2%toplayer_name%&8] '
Â  Â  msg:
Â  Â Â  Â default-color: 'f'
Â  Â Â  Â hover: '&7Date: %server_time_h:mm:ss a%'

######################################################################
#
# GLOBAL CHAT FORMAT
#
######################################################################
GLOBAL:
Â Â - requirement: null
Â  Â  parts:
Â  Â Â  Â server:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â text: '&8[&3%server_name%&8] '
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â hover: |-
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &7Server &3%server_name%
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &r
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &7Version: &6%server_version%
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &7Online: &a%server_online%&7/&2%server_max_players%
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &7TPS: &b%server_tps%
Â  Â Â  Â player:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â text: '&e%player_name%&8: '
Â  Â  msg:
Â  Â Â  Â default-color: 'f'
Â  Â Â  Â hover: '&7Date: %server_time_h:mm:ss a%'

######################################################################
#
# STAFF CHANNEL CHAT
#
######################################################################
STAFF:
Â Â - requirement: null
Â  Â  parts:
Â  Â Â  Â staff:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â text: '&8[&cSTAFF&8] '
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â hover: |-
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &7Server &3%server_name%
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &r
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &7Version: &6%server_version%
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &7Online: &a%server_online%&7/&2%server_max_players%
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &7TPS: &b%server_tps%
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &7
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  &aâ–¶ &2Click to connect to this server
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â command: '/server %server_name%'
